title: Hunted by Darkness
description: One mark was all it took. . .Now, Evie must leave home because of one bad decision and its resulting burn simply to protect her family from the rising darkness and train with warrior angels just to survive.She must fight in a war she won’t win and discovers the unbelievable things she’s been told in church. . .Angels are real.Demons devour children.The world is at war.. . . are true!But when hints of love turn tragic, and James faces off with her secret admirer, she discovers the complicated, twisted war she’s really fighting.Even with her new found family of warriors, she must rescue her little brother, and become the warrior she never imagined herself to be, or. . .She won't survive another day.
author: J.L. Burrows
